CrochetMatic

Jan. – Aug. 2019

Introduction

Overview

1. Related Work
2. Initial Design
3. Low-Fidelity Prototypes
4. Initial High-Fidelity Prototype
5. Final High-Fidelity Prototype
6. Reflection & Future Work

This project was done in collaboration with Steve Marschner. We also worked with François Guimbretière and Amrit Kwatra, who worked on building the physical CrochetMatic system. I was primarily responsible for the electrical and microcontroller components of the project. My own personal goals for Tile Tunes were to gain experience working on user experience-focused projects, and learning how to approach engineering with a design-focused mindset.

); } } export default Crochetmatic;
